        public static WorldInfo getOrCreateWorldInfo(org.spongepowered.api.world.World world)

        Returns:
        The fetched or newly created WorldInfo

        public static boolean givePlayer(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player player,
                                 org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.ItemStack stack)
        Safely give an ItemStack to a player. Offers the ItemStack in the player's inventory if not full, otherwise summon a TileEntity of the item at the player's location.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to give an ItemStack to
        stack - The ItemStack to give
        Returns:
        Whether the operation succeeded or not
